node.title: 'I am very lucky': Woman trapped after car crashes through shop window
node.description: Two people were treated for minor injuries and the woman was taken to Taup≈ç Hospital with moderate injuries.
node.content: ["Police are investigating after a driver crashed through a shop window, trapping a woman in Taup\u014d.", "Emergency services were called to the scene on January 11 at the Merchant 1948 Footwear store on Te Heuheu Street.", "Police confirmed two people were treated for minor injuries and the woman was taken to Taup\u014d Hospital with moderate injuries.\u00a0", "The woman had been browsing the shop when she heard a car revving behind her.", "According to the NZ Herald, the driver had put her foot on the accelerator instead of the brake and crashed right into the back wall of the shop, pinning a woman between the car and a shelf.", "\"They took me into the ambulance and up to the hospital. I am very lucky that I only ended up with a few cuts and bruises as it could have been a lot worse,\" the woman named Sue told the NZ Herald.", "She expressed her gratitude to the emergency services, the shopkeepers and other people that helped her during the crash."]
